name: Linnihan Foy Advertising
description:
Linnihan Foy Advertising is a full-service Minneapolis advertising agency offering B2B and B2C marketing expertise to a wide range of clientele. Our experience ranges from retail and product packaging to professional services and industrial markets.Â 
We help businesses grow with an integrated approach that encompasses branding, PR, web development, media planning, trade show marketing, video and animation, consumer product packaging, search engine optimization and marketing, collateral, market research, and more.
